Package io.github.anon10w1z.cpp.enchantments

Works with Craft++'s enchantments

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CppEnchantmentBase
    Base class for all of Craft++'s enchantments
    CppEnchantments
    Initializes Craft++'s enchantments
    EnchantmentBlazing
    Automatically smelts the drops of harvested blocks
    EnchantmentHoming
    Makes arrows shot out of bows track down their targets
    EnchantmentHops
    Gives the wearer jump boost
    EnchantmentNimble
    Gives the wearer speed
    EnchantmentSiphon
    Gives you the drops directly when harvesting blocks
    EnchantmentVeteran
    Draws experience points and item entities toward the wearer
    EnchantmentVigor
    Gives the wearer an extra heart per enchantment level
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EntityTickingEnchantment
    Marks an enchantment that performs its action on every tick, specific to each entity in the world
